text: Pedesina is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Sondrio in the Italian region Lombardy. It is the least populated municipality in Italy. Pedesina is about northeast of Milan and about southwest of Sondrio. As of 31 December 2008, it had a population of 33, and an area of .All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute Istat. Pedesina borders the following municipalities: Bema, Gerola Alta, Premana, Rasura, Rogolo. == References == Category:Settlements in Sondrio
title: Pedesina
